#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long factor_sum(int n)
{
	int i=2;
	long long sum=1;
	while(i<=n/2)
		{
			if(i>n/i)
				break;
			if(n%i==0)
			{
				if(i!=n/i)
				{
					sum+=i+n/i;
				}
					
				else
				{
					sum+=i;
				}
					
			}
			i++;
		}
		return sum;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int i=2,n;
		long long sum;
		cin>>n;
		sum=factor_sum(n);
		if(n==factor_sum(sum))
		{
			cout<<"Yes, amicable with "<<sum<<endl;
		}
		else
			cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
